tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Chinese Pizza - Epic Meal Time
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: LIKE/FAV this video EpicMealTime is changing the pizza game! We're hitting up the wok so we can fuse the very best takeout items to our custom dough. Drop that box of beef and broccoli hater, this is how you do Chinese Pizza. GET OUR NEW APP!!! AppStore: itunes.apple.com Google Play (For Android): play.google.com BUY HATS, HOODIES and T-SHIRTS!!! shop.epicmealtime.com http www.twitter.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Pizza because it's great at whatever time of the day whether you are hungover or not. Also leftover pizza﻿ can be eaten cold which means more laziness!
Left﻿ over pizza, with some more booze!!!
leftover pizza :-)﻿
Leftover Chinese, specially with peanut sauce.﻿
leftover﻿ pizza
left over pizzas are boss﻿
Left over pizza cuz u﻿ can't get pizza frozen at the restaurant
CHINESE PIZZA﻿
I would eat any leftovers. Love Epic﻿ Meal Time!
Who's that girlie man that always﻿ uses utensils?
Left over﻿ Chinese pizza
left over pizza﻿ but i think the only thing to help a hangover is BACON
Left over pizza of course﻿
Pizza IS THE ONLY EPIC HANGOVER FOOOOOOOD but it must have﻿ BACON
Left over Pizza, obviously. Italy﻿ ftw.
On second thought, as long as I can enjoy the leftovers with muscles glasses.. I don't﻿ care what i'm eating.
Lo mein is a dish best served cold! Chinese all﻿ day
Shit, I usually just fry up﻿ some bacon.
Chinese food﻿ pizza
leftover pizza﻿
Pizza﻿
Left over pizza﻿ because for some reason i like cold food and cold pizza with bacon ahhhhh shit
leftover pizza. my﻿ pizza always has bacon.
i'm gay﻿
left over pizza !! all the way﻿
